desc: A Brighton UK based store specializing in vinyl, CDs, merch & cassettes from the Bella Union Record label, founded in 1997 by Cocteau Twins. The label is now home to Ezra Furman, Beach House, Father John Misty, Emmy the Great, Spiritualized, Marissa Nadler, The Flaming Lips, John Grant & more. We ship internationally.

layout.text: A Brighton, UK store specializing in the Bella Union Record label. Now shipping internationally.
